entry.title: Janis Wemyss posted a photo to Facebook

activity:object.title: Timeline Photos
activity:object.subtitle: We want to make the whole world cruelty-freeBut we need your help!Watch and share our new video: http://bit.ly/16bDgMXThis movement is Cruelty Free InternationalWe canâ€™t do it without you
activity:object.content: <![CDATA[<![CDATA[Healing Joy DragonMagic shared Cruelty Free International's photo.There are so many companies that don't com.gnip.api.test on animals, please buy responsibly. If you get all your toiletries in a Supermarket, 95 % of them will have used animal testing. Anything by Johnson & Johnson (Vaseline, Baby oil, All of Johnson's Baby Products/ Procter & Gamble (Colgate Toothpaste, Palmolive, Radox bath and soaps, Fairy Liquid, Persil, Ariel, Loreal, Garnier,Olay the list goes on and on...Just look for the little bunny sign on the back that supports cruelty free. AND you may have to go out of your way to find a wholefoods, or an independent, organic shop, and it may cost a little bit more, but aren't our furry brothers and sisters worth it? It's no good sitting in a circle/ceremony chanting 'Aho' all my relations and then not bothering to buy with awareness of ALL our relations... Thanks for reading ]]>]]>
